author: Matt Falcon
comment: Incredible. I have a real old Samsung Gear Live, my daily beater. Obviously not Android 2.0. I knew I just took off my watch but it DISAPPEARED. It was still connected via the Wear app, so I knew I could install a watch app remotely. Google didn't offer any help, no! But this app did. The vibrate and flash didn't work... But the microphone did! It was buried in my bed sheets (hence no vibrate). Nice!! Donated a beer for it.

OMG I LOVE THIS APP!!! LITERALLY SAVED ME FROM LOSING MY WATCH AT A HOTEL I WAS STAYING IN... IT WAS IN A BAG AND I WAS GOING CRAZY CAUSE I COULDNT FIND IT SO THE FLASH WASNT MUCH HELP BUT THE MIC DID IT!!!! I WAS ABLE TO PICK UP MY VOICE FROM MY WATCHS MIC AND THAT'S HOW I FOUND IT... ❤❤❤❤

author: neil pickles
comment: Found my connected lost watch, remote installed the app to watch. Like a game of hot n cold with mic. Fun finding watch after toddler had hidden it. Been looking over an hour before installing this. Then found in 10 mins. Job well done

author: Nutelladroid ,
comment: Installed the app remotely to my watch then it made my phone vibrate, make a loud noise and flash the screen. Found it easily. Haven't tried the microphone feature but the app is great even without it.

author: Tech Junkie
comment: Does exactly what I need it to.. I have vision problems, and this helps!

author: Sam Moe
comment: To be fair, it is a very useful app for when you cannot find your watch, especially handy that you can remotely install with Android Wear 2.0. I would have been searching for hours! (Why one earth did I leave the watch in the bathroom?..)

author: Alexis Ruiz
comment: This app is the bomb I lost my no bradshaw watch and was freaking out but with the app I found it in the one place I would have never looked very helpful

author: Mitchell Axtell
comment: Works as advertised. Installed it before I needed it, and it's saved me a bunch of time looking.

author: Haashim Shahzada
comment: It's good at what it does

author: Hise name
comment: Hate it!😟

author: Michael Kane
comment: What a brilliant little app

author: Darren Lord
comment: Saying I'm not connected to my watch and I am

author: Makoto Schoppert
comment: Worked great! Found my watch.

author: a b
comment: Works amazingly well! I lost my watch in a pile of cloths. I have no idea of how it got there and would never have found it without this app. P.S. don't clap, whistle to find it. I found it far more effective

author: Leonard Brooks
comment: Cool, I couldn't find my Huawei watch 2. I downloaded this app and then it gave me the option to remote install the app onto the watch even tho it was lost. then it made my watch beep and boop so I could find it, problem solved. Awesome!

author: Kyle MacDiarmada
comment: Amazing and creative app!!! Cannot complain a bit, no adds and extremely helpful. Only thing I would like is control over the flashing if the screen noise and vibrate, in case it's lost at school.

author: Charlotte Yates
comment: Excellent, found my watch within seconds. It works even on watches without a speaker like the Moto 360.

author: Antonio Edmonds
comment: A must have if you replace your watch. It does what it was intended to do.

author: J Hibbard
comment: The microphone based echolocation worked great! Thanks.

author: Sumanthz Vakacharla
comment: Best app in the wear industry

author: Dylan Rothman
comment: Works flawlessly. Remote install was helpful

author: Mitch Page
comment: Bluddy great

Good unless your using android wear 2.0 I have an issue with android wear 2.0 and so my watch keeps disconnecting. Took me 4 hours to find my watch because it wasn't connected to my phone. It was under the sofa.

author: Grant Simmons
comment: Couldn't remember where I'd taken off my watch.  Downloaded and installed; found my watch in two minutes  (in the garage). Works exactly as described.

author: Alastair McCulloch
comment: Absolutely amazing app. I had lost by watch whilst drunk so the next day I went back to where I definitely remember having the watch and sure enough my phone connected to it and I was able to precisely locate the watch using the microphone feature of the app. Absolutely would recommend

author: Jonathan Paul
comment: Great app. Sounds simple, but I lost my smart watch around the house and this app helped me find it within about 5min! Very grateful.

author: Tyler Flynn
comment: It would not sync with my Fossil Q Founder 2.0 watch even though the app said it was connected.

reply.author: People Talkin'
reply.content: This is a wear 2.0 issue. Apps won't get synced automatically. For now it has to be installed before you lose the watch.

author: Braedn Heney
comment: Just used it Ang a found the watch in the matter of two minutes   WORKS GREAT! I'm so happy

author: Emily Cadot
comment: Doesn't work with Gear s2

author: Pentti Hämäläinen
comment: Lost my Huawei Watch somewhere at home and in 2 minutes found it with this app!

author: Chris Rodriguez
comment: Perfect, but same as the Battery app. Can you add a widget for the home screen?

author: JoshMcGrath98
comment: So easy to use! Very helpful. This is my new and only stay on watch app!

author: Clinton Hillman
comment: Find with mic now works for me. Great product!

reply.author: People Talkin'
reply.content: Hi, thank you for letting me know about your issues. If you let me know which Wear device and phone you have, along with the exact issues, it would be extremely helpful to me. Feel free to shoot me an email! - ppltalkin@gmail.com

author: Wade Abendanio
comment: Great. Works as stated. Found it with the help of the microphone.

author: Farzad Abasi
comment: Helped me find my watch

author: Robyn Klopp
comment: Does exactly what it says on the box. I set my watch down and forgot where I left it. We have a large house and I still had it back in a couple minutes. Thank you!

author: Confused in China
comment: Awesome! FYI you don't need to set this up beforehand. I downloaded it after I lost my watch, and it was still able to sync with android wear and locate it. 5 stars all the way.

author: Kirti Vaidya
comment: Downloaded after not being able to locate the watch. The app functioned, the watch beeped, and we reunited!

author: ayman ghosn
comment: Helped me recover my watch from the pool area. Installed it and listened to the microphone and I was able to pinpoint it through people talking around it.

author: Deven Eleven
comment: OMG!!!! I had been looking for my watch for 3 days and I installed this and 1 button and I found it instantly
